title: DayZ Standalone 0.42.116.002 - Update 1 (by Kortal)
description:
You must have the full game by Kortal to install this update. You can't connect to the Kortal main server without this update.

Main server: dayz.kortal.org on port 2402 -> last game version running (0.42.116.002 + Update 1)
Rescue server: dayz.kortal.org on port 2502 -> previous game version running (0.37.115.791)

Don't wait to upgrade to 0.42.116.002 + Update 1, the rescue server (running old version) will soon be closed!


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Requierement:

DayZ StandAlone 0.42.116.002 (full game) by Kortal


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Changelog:

+ Adding more animals in the forest
+ Add textures firefighteraxe green and black (official devs had not yet done so!)
- Correction ironsight M4 (viewfinders are still unusable on right click)
- Correction description ak
- Correcting his shotgun reloading
- Fixed some loot that appeared too
- 5% chance of loot on zombie: soda box tuna or rags (items are dropped near body). Bodies disappear after 2 min
- Various fixes in the database
